data: SUS Perinatal Treatment of Alcohol Withdrawal
T;N, Notify provider if patient has seizures
Prediction of Alcohol Withdrawal Severity Scale (PAWSS)
Complete the Prediction of Alcohol Withdrawal Severity Scale (PAWSS)
Clinical Institute Withdrawal Assessment for Alcohol Use: Perinatal

Record baseline CIWA-Ar score then monitor as per protocol at the first signs of alcohol withdrawal. Monitor CIWA-Ar q1h until score below 10 for 3 consecutive readings, then continue CIWA-Ar q6h for 24 hours, then q24h for 72 h, then discontinue
Complete along with CIWA-Ar and document MEOWS
If CIWA-Ar score 20 or greater and pregnant 22+0 weeks or greater, assess fetal heart via doptone at least q4h

If patient refuses 3 consecutive CIWA-Ar assessments, if CIWA-AR score greater than 20, if there is a change in CIWA-Ar score greater than 10 or there is an intention to medicate below CIWA-Ar score of 10
If patient  is confused or agitated, shows evidence of delirium or if patient is difficult to rouse
200 mg, IV, qdaily, order duration: 5 day, drug form: inj
200 mg, IM, qdaily, order duration: 5 day, drug form: inj
If IV or IM route of thiamine not feasible then select PO route
